contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 13, 2004 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-second-section
Test Piece Contest
A Celtic Suite
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Andrew Smith (Solo Cornet)—Newbridge Celynen Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
Aug. 12, 2015, 2:03 a.m. July 2, 2020, 11:28 a.m.
1 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland
2 Ynyshir Band Alan MacDonald
3 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
4 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Ron Williams
5 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
6 Lewis Merthyr Band Lyndon Price
6 Blaenavon Town Band Malcolm Jones
Withdrawn Cwmbran Band Neil Watson
